name: 語言與大腦
description: 這門課程主要是簡介語言與大腦的關係。學生可以學習到(1)大腦的基本知識、(2)語言表徵與處理以及(3)認知神經科學的研究方法。學生也將有機會探索當代一些有趣的主題。
goals: To learn basics of the brain and the basic concepts and methods in linguistics and cognitive neuroscience
To learn how language is represented in the brain, and how it is processed between the ears and the brain, and between the brain and the mouth/hands.
syllabus:

Week 1 Overview of this course

Week 2 Language

Week 3 The human brain

Week 4 Acquired language disorders

Week 5 Developmental language disorders

Week 6  Neuroimaging methods

**_Week 7 Neurolinguistics Lab Tour_**

Week 8 Language representation

Week 9 Word recognition and production

**_Week 10 Midterm_** 

Week 11 Sentence production and comprehension & **Assign final project groups**

Week 12 Language development & **Submit group project topics**

Week 14 Language evolution

**GROUP PROJECTS (Details will be given later)**

Week 15 Group project presentations I

Week 16 Group project presentations II

Week 17 Group project presentations III & Summary
